projects.name: Pokébook
projects.description: View & Search for pokemons. Customized Theme.
projects.more_information: A web application that allows users to explore information about different Pokémon, with a custom UI theme.

projects.name: RecipeShare
projects.description: Submit & View recipes from other users.
projects.more_information: A platform for users to share and discover new recipes, featuring user authentication.

projects.name: Voting Web App
projects.description: Vote & Manage elections. Reports are generated.
projects.more_information: A web app for managing elections, allowing users to vote and generate result reports.

projects.name: Knowords
projects.more_information: An English lexical application that helps users improve their vocabulary through interactive learning.

projects.name: Perfume Shopping Site
projects.more_information: A modern e-commerce website dedicated to selling perfumes, featuring user authentication.

projects.name: Python Scraper & Content Extractor
projects.description: Scrape & Extract content from websites and track changes.
projects.more_information: A Python application that scrapes and extracts content from websites, and tracks changes over time. It uses RAG for summarization.
